action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ismark makes two longsword attacks. If he has a shortsword drawn, he can also make a shortsword attack.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: 1 Spellcasting
headerEntries: Spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks.

trait.name: Channel Divinity ( /short rest)
entries: Ismark can choose one of the following effects when he uses his Channel Divinity.

Champion Challenge. As a bonus action, Ismark can issue a challenge that compels other creatures to do battle with him. Each creature of his choice within 30 feet of him must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature can't willingly move more than 30 feet away from him. This effect ends if he is {@condition incapacitated} or dies, or if the creature is more than 30 feet away from him.
Turn the Tide. As a bonus action, Ismark can bolster injured creatures with his Channel Divinity. Each creature of his choice within 30 feet of him regains hit points equal to {@damage 1d6+3}.
